quote: And as we round the bend toward Ivy Cottage, he tugs my braid just the way he always has ever since I was six, and then he reaches down and takes my hand.Maybe sometimes dreams really do come true.
quote_letters: AND AS WE ROUND THE BEND TOWARD IVY COTTAGE HE TUGS MY BRAID JUST THE WAY HE ALWAYS HAS EVER SINCE I WAS SIX AND THEN HE REACHES DOWN AND TAKES MY HANDMAYBE SOMETIMES DREAMS REALLY DO COME TRUE
